alert.note: Alert for Union; Wallowa (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued September 15 at 11:37AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PDT FRIDAY... Oregon Department of Environmental Quality has issued an Air Quality Advisory...in effect until 1 PM PDT Friday. A Smoke Air Quality Advisory has been issued. Wildfires burning in the region combined with forecasted conditions will cause air quality to reach unhealthy levels. Pollutants in smoke can cause burning eyes...runny nose...aggravate heart and lung diseases...and aggravate other serious health problems. Limit outdoor activities and keep children indoors if it is smoky. Please follow medical advice if you have a heart or lung condition. For additional information...please visit the Web site at http://www.oregon.gov/DEQ
